welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Malnate, Italy! Get ready to indulge in delicious local cuisine, admire stunning architecture, and immerse yourself in the rich culture. Enjoy your stay and discover all that Malnate has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
